Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

We accept Trade We offer finance, all banks. All vehicles come with a Road worthy certificate, 80-Point check, Quality Valet

2005 CHEVROLET LUMINA, 190197 KM, BLACK with OTHER.

10055155
  All available records show the odometer reading on this vehicle to be accurate. There is not a skip or slip, just pure smoothness in this vehicle's transmission. The vehicle engine runs very, very smooth. This vehicle's exterior is very clean. This is a very well maintained vehicle with a clean interior. You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.

attributes.description: Balance of 5 year / unlimited mileage factory warranty, Balance of 5 year / 90 000 kms factory service plan, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership
